content.question: Based on the <math alttext="L D 50" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>LD</mtext> <mn>50</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> values, which of the following best describes the toxicity level of the household substances shown in the table?

choices.label: Aspirin is less toxic than vinegar.
Table salt is more toxic than vinegar.
Antifreeze is more toxic than aspirin.
Table salt is the most toxic substance in the table.

content.answer: Antifreeze is more toxic than aspirin.
